name: Fjallraven Abisko Cool Short Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
description:
Stay cool on sun-baked trails or while travelling in tropical heat. This lightweight tee is made with Tencel Lyocell, a viscose-like fibre that's soft on skin and wicks moisture.Underarm gussets for unrestricted movement.Sewn-in ventilation holes release excess heat.

        Sustainability









                      Preferred Lyocell
